index_about_lead: We are a civic association focused on supporting educational opportunities and personal development through the Erasmus+ program. Our main mission is to create opportunities for young people, students, youth workers, and the general public to participate in international projects, exchanges, and training.
projects_lead: Interested in our projects? Click Learn More.
faq_q1: Who can participate? Can I join even if I'm not a student?
faq_a1: You don’t need to be a student to participate! Just meet these conditions:
faq_a1_list1: For youth exchanges: age 13–30 (team leader can be older than 30)
faq_a1_end: And that’s it! No proof of study or employment is required.
faq_a2_1: Participation in projects is completely free! Accommodation and meals are covered by EU grants.
faq_a2_2: Travel costs are reimbursed up to a certain amount (depending on distance) usually within one month after the project.
faq_q3: I don't speak English well. Is that a problem?
faq_a3: Not at all! On the contrary, traveling gives you the chance to practice your English. You always go as part of a national team, so if your English isn't perfect, your Slovak teammates will help you with translation and communication.
faq_a4_1: Just fill out the application form for the project you're interested in. You can find the currently available projects on the
faq_a4_2: page. After reviewing candidates, we’ll contact you—and if you're still interested, you're in!
